name: Button
description_zh: 按钮用于开始一个即时操作。

autoInsertSpace.description: Auto insert space between two Chinese characters
autoInsertSpace.description_zh: 我们默认提供两个汉字之间的空格，可以设置 autoInsertSpace 为 false 关闭

block.description: Option to fit button width to its parent width
block.description_zh: 将按钮宽度调整为其父宽度的选项

color.type: default / primary / danger / blue / purple / cyan / green / magenta / pink / red / orange / yellow / volcano / geekblue / lime / gold

danger.description: Set the danger status of button. When color is set, this prop will be ignored
danger.description_zh: 语法糖，设置危险按钮。当设置 color 时会以后者为准

ghost.description_zh: 幽灵属性，使按钮背景透明

href.description_zh: 点击跳转的地址，指定此属性 button 的行为和 a 链接一致

htmlType.description: Set the original html type of button
htmlType.description_zh: 设置 button 原生的 type 值，可选值请参考 HTML 标准

:icon.description: Set the icon component of button

iconPosition.description: Set the position of icon component
iconPosition.description_zh: 设置按钮图标组件的位置

:loading.description: Set the loading status of button

target.description: Same as target attribute of a, works when href is specified
target.description_zh: 相当于 a 链接的 target 属性，href 存在时生效

type.description: Set button type. When variant and color are set, this prop will be ignored
type.description_zh: 语法糖，设置按钮类型。当设置 variant 与 color 时以后者为准

variant.type: outlined / dashed / solid / filled / text / link

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

typeDetail.PresetColors: blue | purple | cyan | green | magenta | pink | red | orange | yellow | volcano | geekblue | lime | gold
